mom, could you check the rest of the prices... while willie and i go in the house and investigate.

By me, Willie is a nice fella.

Willie is one of our most loved dogs due to his amazing and loving personality. Ever since he was brought to our shelter from the streets, he has done nothing but show love and happiness towards people. He may take a moment before he trusts you, but once he does, he will bring you a lifetime of joy.
Now, Barnabas, I know there are times when Willie seems a little strange but he seemed so concerned about me, even frightened.
